name: Idle Computer Game Company
description:
Own your own game company where you can hire and fire workers. Decide who gets raises, who can get a vacation. Let your workers relax and use things around the office to calm them down or tell them to get back to work! This is an idle capitalist game that you're sure to love. Capitalism is great, but it comes at a cost. The health of your workers matters, but does it matter more than your profits? That's for you to decide!

The object of the game is to make your company last as long as you can with all of the human factors you need to take into account. Your business will grow as long as you can make smart business decisions with your workers. Your workers will want raises, vacations, and relaxation time. It's up to you to decide if your idle workers deserve those things. You can choose what to do with your idle workers, and if they start acting bad you can always fire them and do what's best for your idle company.

Become the best capitalist you can by making smart business decisions and earn the top score among your friends and family. See who the best game company owner is, and who understands capitalism the best. It's an idle game that only requires the tap of your finger.

Features:
- Simple Idle Capitalism Game
- Own your own Computer Game Business
- Hire, Fire workers based on their desired pay
- Give your workers raises, vacations or deny their wishes
- Grow your idle business
- Earn the high score
